full_summary:
# Gear Head, Motors, Electrical, HFX Class
## Solicitation Number: W8482-242259/A
## Closing Date: 2024-02-16 14:00 EST
## Amendment Number: 5

The Department of National Defence invites Proposals for the procurement of non-electric motors and gear heads with the following specifications:

* **Item 1:** Gear Head
	+ Part Number: 212714
	+ NCAGE: 80020
	+ Quantity: 20
	+ Unit of Issue: EA
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia

Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must provide the brand name, model, and/or part number, as well as the NCAGE.

**Important Notice:**

* All bids must be submitted in Canadian dollars. Foreign currency bids will not be accepted.
* Requests for exchange rate fluctuation risk mitigation will not be considered.
* Bidders are expected to submit prices in Canadian dollars.

**Procurement Details:**

* The procurement is being conducted on a competitive, open bidding basis.
* The requirement is not subject to a trade agreement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information:**

* Christopher Cauchi can be reached at christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca or (555) 555-5555.

**Attachments:**

* Amendment 001: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28984/w8482-242259---amendment-001.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28984/w8482-242259---amendment-001.pdf)
* RFP (English): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28984/w8482-242259---rfp---en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28984/w8482-242259---rfp---en.pdf)
* RFP (French): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28984/w8482-242259---rfp---fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28984/w8482-242259---rfp---fr.pdf)

Note:- Attached documents are available
